text: The Redhead and the Cowboy is a 1951 American western movie directed by Leslie Fenton and starring Glenn Ford, Rhonda Fleming, Edmond O'Brien, Alan Reed, Morris Ankrum, Edith Evanson, Jeff York. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by Leslie Fenton Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: The Redhead and the Cowboy
